subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
• Vulnerability assessment of natural and human systems to climate change
• Study on how to attenuate the impact of Greenhouse Gas Emissions (GGEs)
• 2nd Burundi Communication to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) with adaptation action plan 
• Study on climate change projections
subproject.title: Second NLE Comm Climate Change

title: Second National Communication on Climate Change UNFCCC
